languages.text: "Это верно". {n}Последние слова Пощады слетают с его уст, искривленных в наглой усмешке. Даже рухнуть на пол бездыханным он умудряется не утратив до конца аристократического лоска.{/n}

"That's true." {n}Mercy's last words fly from his lips, which are twisted into an impudent smirk. The sheen of his aristocratic hauteur remains undulled right to the very end, when he crashes lifelessly to the floor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Это верно". {n}Последние слова Пощады слетают с его уст, искривленных в наглой усмешке. Даже рухнуть на пол бездыханным он умудряется не утратив до конца аристократического лоска.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "That's true." {n}Mercy's last words fly from his lips, which are twisted into an impudent smirk. The sheen of his aristocratic hauteur remains undulled right to the very end, when he crashes lifelessly to the floor.{/n}

"That's true." {n}Mercy's last words fly from his lips, which are twisted into an impudent smirk. The sheen of his aristocratic hauteur remains undulled right to the very end, when he crashes lifelessly to the floor.{/n}

"That's true." {n}Mercy's last words fly from his lips, which are twisted into an impudent smirk. The sheen of his aristocratic hauteur remains undulled right to the very end, when he crashes lifelessly to the floor.{/n}

languages.text: “确实如此。”{n}悯慈说出了最后一句话，嘴角露出了放肆的冷笑。直到最后一刻，他毫无生气的尸身倒在地上时，他脸上贵族特有的傲慢依然没有褪去。{/n}
languages.original_text: "That's true." {n}Mercy's last words fly from his lips, which are twisted into an impudent smirk. The sheen of his aristocratic hauteur remains undulled right to the very end, when he crashes lifelessly to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “确实如此。”{n}悯慈说出了最后一句话，嘴角露出了放肆的冷笑。直到最后一刻，他毫无生气的尸身倒在地上时，他脸上贵族特有的傲慢依然没有褪去。{/n}

languages.text: 「その通りだ」{n}マーシーの最後の言葉は、不敵な笑みを浮かべた彼の唇から飛び出した。貴族のような尊大な態度は、彼が床に崩れ落ちる最後の瞬間まで衰えることはなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "That's true." {n}Mercy's last words fly from his lips, which are twisted into an impudent smirk. The sheen of his aristocratic hauteur remains undulled right to the very end, when he crashes lifelessly to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「その通りだ」{n}マーシーの最後の言葉は、不敵な笑みを浮かべた彼の唇から飛び出した。貴族のような尊大な態度は、彼が床に崩れ落ちる最後の瞬間まで衰えることはなかった。{/n}

languages.text: «Así es». {n}Las últimas palabras de Mercy abandonan sus labios, que forman una sonrisa atrevida. Su altivez aristocrática solo abandona su cuerpo cuando cae inerte al suelo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That's true." {n}Mercy's last words fly from his lips, which are twisted into an impudent smirk. The sheen of his aristocratic hauteur remains undulled right to the very end, when he crashes lifelessly to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Así es». {n}Las últimas palabras de Mercy abandonan sus labios, que forman una sonrisa atrevida. Su altivez aristocrática solo abandona su cuerpo cuando cae inerte al suelo.{/n}

languages.text: « Vous avez raison. » {n}Mercy prononce ses derniers mots avec un sourire effronté. Le lustre de son dédain aristocratique persiste jusque dans ses ultimes instants, alors que son corps sans vie s'écrase au sol.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That's true." {n}Mercy's last words fly from his lips, which are twisted into an impudent smirk. The sheen of his aristocratic hauteur remains undulled right to the very end, when he crashes lifelessly to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez raison. » {n}Mercy prononce ses derniers mots avec un sourire effronté. Le lustre de son dédain aristocratique persiste jusque dans ses ultimes instants, alors que son corps sans vie s'écrase au sol.{/n}

languages.text: "Das stimmt." {n}Mercys letzte Worte kommen ihm über seine höhnisch grinsenden Lippen. Der Glanz seiner adligen Ausstrahlung bleibt ihm bis zum Ende erhalten, selbst als er leblos zu Boden stürzt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That's true." {n}Mercy's last words fly from his lips, which are twisted into an impudent smirk. The sheen of his aristocratic hauteur remains undulled right to the very end, when he crashes lifelessly to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das stimmt." {n}Mercys letzte Worte kommen ihm über seine höhnisch grinsenden Lippen. Der Glanz seiner adligen Ausstrahlung bleibt ihm bis zum Ende erhalten, selbst als er leblos zu Boden stürzt.{/n}

languages.text: "Doğru." {n}Merhamet'in son sözleri, küstahça kıvrılmış dudaklarından uçup gidiyor. Aristokratımsı kibrinin göz kamaştırıcılığı son anına, ölüsü yere yığılana kadar yok olmuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That's true." {n}Mercy's last words fly from his lips, which are twisted into an impudent smirk. The sheen of his aristocratic hauteur remains undulled right to the very end, when he crashes lifelessly to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Doğru." {n}Merhamet'in son sözleri, küstahça kıvrılmış dudaklarından uçup gidiyor. Aristokratımsı kibrinin göz kamaştırıcılığı son anına, ölüsü yere yığılana kadar yok olmuyor.{/n}
